## remake run

Run a Makefile target

```
remake run [flags] [targets]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --file string   Makefile path or remote reference
  -h, --help          help for run
      --no-cache      disable cache
```

### SEE ALSO

* [remake](remake.md)	 - CLI for running Makefiles with remote includes
